title: Top 5 of CFP unchanged; Ducks leapfrog Ole Miss
content: Ohio State, Indiana, Texas A&M, Georgia and Texas Tech remained the top five teams in the latest College Football Playoff rankings released Tuesday, while Oregon jumped ahead of Ole Miss after its win over USC.

title: Okla. State hires UNT's Morris to revive program
content: Eric Morris, who has led North Texas to a 10-1 record this season while averaging 503.3 yards per game, has been hired as the next coach at Oklahoma State.

title: Panthers safety Moehrig suspended for low blow
content: The NFL has suspended Panthers safety Tre'von Moehrig one game without pay for striking 49ers wide receiver Jauan Jennings in the groin area Monday night.

title: Burrow: Not sitting if healthy, even with Cincy 3-8
content: Joe Burrow, set to return Thursday from a turf toe injury, said he didn't consider remaining on the sidelines to avoid the risk of further injury with the Bengals' playoff hopes nearly gone.

title: Red Sox acquire durable Gray in trade with Cards
content: The Red Sox have acquired veteran Sonny Gray in a trade with the Cardinals in exchange for two pitchers. The three-time All-Star was 14-8 with a 4.28 ERA last season.

title: Colorado QB Lewis to sit finale, preserve redshirt
content: Colorado true freshman quarterback Julian Lewis will not play in Saturday's season finale against Kansas State to preserve his redshirt, coach Deion Sanders announced Tuesday.

title: NYC mayor vows to punish brawlers at UFC 322
content: New York City mayor Eric Adams is vowing to hold fighters who were involved in a massive cageside brawl at UFC 322 at Madison Square Garden on Nov. 15 accountable pending an investigation.

title: Missing HS coach wanted on criminal charges
content: Travis L. Turner, who disappeared days before his undefeated team's playoff game, faces charges of possessing child sexual abuse material and using a computer to solicit a minor, Virginia State Police said.

content: James has scored in double-digits for nearly 1,300 straight games. But there is another streak that's even more remarkable -- and now in danger.

content: As drama at Ole Miss drags on, there's a game to play Friday. The pressure on Kiffin to win will be overwhelming.

content: The Lions wanted to sign Hutchinson to a long-term contract, but deals for other pass rushers, especially Micah Parsons, kept moving the target.

title: 'When you boss around... ': Kohli's brother takes jibe at Team IND management
content: Vikas Kohli, brother of Virat Kohli, has voiced concerns over India's Test cricket strategy. His comments come as India faces a tough situation in the Guwahati Test. The team's recent performances have drawn scrutiny. Vikas suggested changes have unsettled a previously successful system. India is currently battling to salvage a draw against South Africa.

title: Amazon's AI power play: Tech giant vetoes third-party tools; 'Kiro' takes centre stage
content: Amazon has directed its software engineers to cease using third-party AI coding tools like OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude Code, mandating exclusive use of its proprietary system, Kiro. This strategic move aims to bolster Amazon's competitive standing against rivals OpenAI and Google in the rapidly expanding AI code assistant market.

title: IND vs SA: Ravindra Jadeja says series loss 'won't affect' next Test match
content: Ravindra Jadeja believes the likely series loss to South Africa won't impact India's next assignment in Sri Lanka. He stated that drawing the second Test would feel like a win for the young Indian side, emphasizing the learning phase for the inexperienced players. Jadeja also highlighted the challenging conditions faced by Indian bowlers.

title: ‚ÄòAir pollution starts causing harm to children even before they are born‚Äô
content: Delhi-NCR's severe air quality impacts children from the womb. Pollutants affect fetal development, leading to respiratory issues and developmental delays. Infants and young children are more vulnerable due to their developing lungs. Common illnesses like pneumonia and wheezing are exacerbated by pollution. Parents must consult pediatricians for accurate diagnosis and treatment, avoiding myths about antibiotics and inhalers.

title: 'Standing between America & recession': Nvidia CEO's fiery remark; warns of AI bubble
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang stated the company's performance is critical to the global economy, acting as a safeguard against recession. He highlighted the immense pressure Nvidia faces as the backbone of the AI boom, with its success viewed as crucial for both Silicon Valley and Wall Street.

title: Left in lurch: Red fading in Bengal & Tripura; will Kerala's communists find their direction?
content: India's Left faces an introspective period marked by declining vote shares and ideological confusion, evident in West Bengal and Tripura. While Kerala remains a stronghold, it too faces challenges, prompting questions about the party's ability to adapt and reinvent itself amidst shifting political landscapes and strategic alliances.

title: 'Watching it on TV‚Ä¶': Rohit Sharma breaks silence on missing first-ever T20 WC
content: Rohit Sharma's streak of playing in every T20 World Cup ends as he becomes an ambassador for the 2026 edition.  He admits adjusting to watching the tournament on TV is a new experience, though he remains an active ODI player.  Sharma reflected on the difficulty of winning global trophies and the team's recent triumphs.

title: Gemini 3.0 launch: Salesforce CEO says won't use ChatGPT again; praises Google‚Äôs AI model
content: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff declared he's switching from ChatGPT to Google's Gemini 3.0 after a two-hour trial, citing significant improvements in reasoning, speed, image, and video processing. This endorsement highlights the intense competition in the AI landscape, with even OpenAI's CEO acknowledging Google's advancements.

title: Taylor Swift‚Äôs Disney plus docuseries faces legal threat from Florida courtroom
content: Taylor Swift's Disney+ docuseries faces a legal challenge from Florida artist Kimberly Marasco, who alleges copyright infringement. Marasco seeks to halt the release, claiming Swift used her poetry for lyrics and visual themes. Swift's team dismisses the claims as baseless, and legal experts deem an injunction unlikely, though the case sparks debate on creative overlap.

title: K'taka power tussle: DKS hints at secret power pact; CM lobs ball into Delhi
content: Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar has confirmed a confidential leadership transition understanding among Congress leaders post the 2023 election victory. Meanwhile, Chief Minister Siddaramaiah urged an end to public speculation, stating the central leadership holds the final decision. Shivakumar is now in Delhi to discuss the Karnataka political situation.

title: Canucks goalie Kevin Lankinen steps away; how his absence could impact season
content: Vancouver Canucks face a goaltending crisis on a crucial road trip as Kevin Lankinen departs for personal reasons. This leaves the team without their recent starter, compounding the absence of the injured Thatcher Demko.  AHL call-ups Jiri Patera and Nikita Tolopilo are now on standby, highlighting the team's urgent need for stability between the pipes.

title: Ayesha Curry shares heartfelt note to Stephen days after marriage remark
content: Ayesha Curry posted a heartwarming message for her husband Stephen Curry's new book, "Shot Ready," amidst recent online backlash. She had previously expressed on a podcast that she didn't initially want marriage or children, leading to fan outrage and accusations of disrespecting her husband.

title: Jammie Booker wins World‚Äôs Strongest Woman title as Andrea Thompson issues protest
content: The 2025 World's Strongest Woman event sparked controversy as Jammie Booker, reportedly a biological male, secured the top prize. Runner-up Andrea Thompson's visible dismay and subsequent comments ignited a fierce debate on fairness in women's sports. Prominent athletes and fans rallied behind Thompson, questioning the integrity of the competition and advocating for clear rules.

title: Is Luka Doncic playing vs Clippers? Latest injury update for Mavericks star
content: Luka Doncic is set to play for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Los Angeles Clippers. His return is a major boost for the Lakers. The Clippers are facing injury issues. Doncic is healthy and in dominant form. This game is crucial for both teams in the NBA Cup group stage. His presence will add intensity to the rivalry.

title: Imran Khan, Bushra Bibi, Asim Munir: The silent coup and Pak's new triumvirate
content: In a dramatic shift, Pakistan's 27th Constitutional Amendment has completely altered its governance landscape. This change provides lifetime immunity to President Zardari and Field Marshal Munir, while jeopardizing the independence of the judiciary. With the military chief now controlling all major services, including the nuclear arsenal, the Supreme Court has been reduced to a mere puppet of the executive branch.

title: Lakers vs Clippers injury report: Who‚Äôs out for Nov 25 showdown
content: The Los Angeles Clippers faced the Lakers on November 25, 2025, severely short-handed with key players like Bradley Beal and Derrick Jones Jr. sidelined. Despite Kawhi Leonard's return, the Clippers' 5-12 record reflected their injury struggles. The Lakers, while missing Deandre Ayton, fielded a more stable roster led by LeBron James and Luka Donƒçiƒá.

title: Xi trumps the Don amid fraying ties with Japan and India
content: China's leader Xi Jinping and US President Donald Trump held a call solidifying their "G-2" compact with mutual visit invitations. This occurred as Beijing pressed Taiwan claims amid spats with Japan and India, with Trump's public statement omitting any mention of Taiwan, focusing instead on trade.

title: Cardi B focuses on motherhood as Diggs‚ÄìOffset IG model drama grows
content: Miami Instagram model Jordyn Gorr accused Offset of attempting to set her up with Stefon Diggs as Cardi B was pregnant. A source close to Offset has denied these allegations, stating the model has a feud with him unrelated to Diggs. Neither Diggs nor Cardi B have commented on the situation.

title: Joel Embiid ruled out suddenly, 76ers hit by alarming setback
content: Joel Embiid has been ruled out for the Philadelphia 76ers' game against the Orlando Magic due to ongoing right knee injury management, marking his eighth consecutive absence.  Despite Tyrese Maxey being available, the Sixers will also be without Paul George, VJ Edgecombe, Kelly Oubre Jr., and Adem Bona, facing significant injury challenges.

title: Can vitamin B12 deficiency cause fatty liver? Symptoms and treatment
content: Fatty liver disease, especially NAFLD, is a growing global health concern. Research highlights Vitamin B12 deficiency as a key contributor to its development and progression. Low B12 levels impair fat metabolism in the liver, leading to fat buildup and inflammation. Early detection and B12 replacement can potentially slow or reverse liver damage. Medical consultation is advised for those at risk.

title: BrahMos gold rush: India close to inking deals worth $450m; how Op Sindoor played role
content: India is close to signing defense deals worth $450 million for BrahMos supersonic cruise missiles. These advanced weapons impressed friendly nations after their precise strikes during a recent conflict. The missiles are also being integrated into the Indian Navy and Air Force. This development highlights India's growing defense capabilities and interest from global buyers.

title: World‚Äôs first lung cancer prevention vaccine trial receives ¬£2.06 m funding
content: A groundbreaking clinical trial is underway in the UK for LungVax, an experimental vaccine designed to prevent lung cancer. This innovative approach trains the immune system to identify and eliminate early abnormal lung cells before they become tumours. Researchers are hopeful this preventative measure could significantly reduce lung cancer incidence and improve survival rates for those at high risk.

title: Smriti Mandhana‚Äôs father discharged from hospital; wedding still postponed
content: Smriti Mandhana‚Äôs father, Shrinivas Mandhana, was discharged from the hospital on Monday morning after his health deteriorated over the weekend. He was admitted on Sunday (November 23) in Sangli ‚Äî the Indian cricketer‚Äôs hometown ‚Äî on the very day Smriti and musician-filmmaker Palaash Muchhal were scheduled to get married.

title: T20 World Cup: Suryakumar reveals team he wants to defeat in final, it's not PAK - Watch
content: Suryakumar Yadav expressed a desire to face Australia in the 2026 T20 World Cup final for redemption after the 2023 ODI World Cup loss. Rohit Sharma and Harmanpreet Kaur emphasized winning over opponent preference. Rohit was also announced as the tournament ambassador. India are in Group A along with Pakistan.

title: Jonathan Toews‚Äô net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary & endorsements
content: Jonathan Toews, a celebrated NHL veteran, has returned to the ice with the Winnipeg Jets in 2025 on a one-year, $2 million contract. After battling chronic health issues, including long COVID, Toews underwent an Ayurvedic detox in India. His career earnings are estimated at $26 million, with potential for performance bonuses on his current deal.

title: 'Full confidence in security': Israel after Netanyahu defers India visit; new dates soon
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu expressed full confidence in India's security under Prime Minister Narendra Modi, with both nations working to reschedule Netanyahu's postponed visit. The statement follows a car blast in Delhi, prompting Netanyahu to emphasize the shared spirit of both countries in confronting terrorism.

title: ICC T20 WC: Tournament to begin on February 7, final on March 8 - Check full schedule
content: The ICC has unveiled the schedule for the 2026 T20 World Cup, co-hosted by India and Sri Lanka. The tournament kicks off on February 7th, featuring Pakistan vs. Netherlands and India's title defense against the USA. The event will span 29 days across eight venues, culminating in the final on March 8th.

title: Vande Bharat sleeper trains; AC-powered Amrit Bharat upgrades - What train travel will look like in 2026
content: Over 200 Vande Bharat sleeper trains are expected to be rolled out in the coming years as Indian Railways looks to revamp long-distance train travel. What trains can passengers look forward to in the coming years? What will be the features of these trains and rollout timelines? We explore:

title: Kevin Durant‚Äôs family break sparks fan buzz ahead of Suns, Warriors games
content: Houston Rockets star Kevin Durant will miss the next two games due to a family matter, sparking fan speculation. The absence comes as the Rockets face former teams Phoenix Suns and Golden State Warriors, leading to jokes about avoidance. While a fatherhood rumor has surfaced, it remains unconfirmed, with fans sending well wishes.

title: What is Mat Ishbia‚Äôs net worth? Billionaire hit by Suns ownership scandal
content: Phoenix Suns owner Mat Ishbia faces accusations of financial manipulation, self-dealing, and fraud from minority owners Scott Seldin and Andy Kohlberg. The complaint alleges Ishbia used the team as a "personal piggy bank" for his own gain and that of his other businesses. This legal action adds to existing turmoil within the Suns' ownership.

title: 2030 CWG: Ahmedabad to be named host city tomorrow; grand celebrations planned at home
content: Ahmedabad is poised to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games, with a formal announcement to be made on Wednesday. India's bid gained momentum following the Executive Board's approval last month. It will be the first time the Commonwealth Games will be held in India since New Delhi's hosting in 2010.

title: 50 years after Tony Greig's 'Grovel', SA head coach repeats word
content: Conrad triggered controversy at the end of the fourth day‚Äôs play in Guwahati after using a phrase that carries a loaded history in cricket. Speaking at the press conference after  the day's play, Conrad said, "We wanted them (India) to really grovel." The Proteas kept on batting despite the lead crossing 500 in the second session and coach Shukri Conrad said they wanted to make sure they ended India's hopes of a series-levelling win.

title: 'Until Brahmin donates daughter': IAS officer's remark stirs row; issues clarification
content: A senior IAS officer in Madhya Pradesh faces backlash after a viral video showed him linking reservation continuation to inter-caste marriage. The All India Brahmin Society condemned the remarks as "indecent" and "casteist," demanding an FIR and disciplinary action. The officer later clarified his statement was taken out of context, expressing regret if sentiments were hurt.

title: Widely quoted WHO norm of 1 doctor per 1,000 people is not official
content: The benchmark was repeatedly used by the government to compare doctor availability in India over the last decade

title: Mekedatu dam project: a long-standing source of friction between Tamil Nadu and Karnataka
content: The idea of the project proponent ‚Äì the Karnataka government ‚Äì is to impound 67.16 thousand million cubic ft (TMC) of water by building a balancing reservoir at Mekedatu (which, in Kannada, means ‚Äògoat‚Äôs leap‚Äô), about 100 km from Bengaluru.

title: Cabinet takes serious note of BRS charges on industrial land policy
content: BRS leaders indulging in mudslinging against govt. for political gains, relocation of industries within ORR limits not new, issue was mooted by previous governments also, say Ministers

title: Ootupurai, the traditional feeding house in Kanniyakumari temples
content: Ootupurai, where Brahmins were served free meals, was once a familiar institution across southern Travancore and Kanniyakumari district which remained part of Kerala until 1957. Although the British administration ordered the discontinuation of¬†this¬†system in 1922, it survived in several temples long after the decree.

content: Palasa Naveen Kumar raises funds, involves community leaders to renovate the dilapidated building and guides 17 students to qualify Navodaya and Ekalavya entrance exams

title: Nigerian drug peddler arrested and 14.8 kg of synthetic drugs worth ‚Çπ23.7 crore recovered in Bengaluru
content: In one of the biggest drug busts in the city in recent times, the Anti Narcotics Wing of the Central Crime Branch on Tuesday arrested a 42-year-old Nigerian national and recovered 14.84 kg of synthetic drugs, including 11.6 kg of MDMA crystals, 1.04 kg of ecstasy pills, and 2.2 kg of raw chemicals used for preparation of the drugs, worth ‚Çπ23.7 crore

title: Census: Pilot project of house-listing begins in Bengaluru‚Äôs J.P. Park ward; centre officials review app testing
content: A pilot exercise to test a new mobile application developed for the 2027 Census is under way in J.P. Park ward under the North Corporation

content: Minister Vijay Kumar Choudhary confirmed the new allotment for Ms. Devi on Harding Road, saying, ‚ÄúIt has enough space and is designated for high-ranking officials‚Äù

content: Against the target of providing 65,000 government jobs within two years, the Odisha government has appointed 37,325 persons in just 17 months, Mohan Majhi said

content: The comprehensive development plan includes several major works aimed at improving facilities for devotees and enhancing the infrastructure around the popular temple

content: Tamil Nadu is attracting investments amid intense competition from other States¬†and even countries such as Vietnam and Thailand, he says at the¬†TNRising¬†Conclave in¬†Coimbatore

content: Personalities like Guru Tegh Bahadur ji are rare, and his life, sacrifice, and character remain a great source of inspiration, the PM said

content: Defence Minister says India is ready to help shape the ‚Äúmaritime century‚Äù by ‚Äúbuilding not only ships, but trust; not only platforms, but partnerships‚Äù

content: When public money is involved, every citizen of this Union Territory has an equal right to be there, irrespective of religion or background, NC leader Tanvir Sadiq said, rebutting the BJP‚Äôs stand

content: The party said Ayushman Bharat card services remain suspended in the State‚Äôs private hospitals for a long time, causing immense hardship to the poor

title: Residents alarmed as pollution turns Doddagubbi lake toxic; fish and birds found dead
content: According to locals, the lake has been steadily degrading over the past several months, with the water turning a murky green due to suspected sewage inflow from nearby residential buildings.

content: The run is being positioned as a global platform to highlight Hyderabad‚Äôs heritage, says Tourism and Culture Minister Jupally Krishna Rao as he unveils the poster for the event

content: Hundreds of personnel were killed and over a thousand injured during Operation Pawan, the 1987 Indian Peace Keeping Force mission in Sri Lanka

title: Andhra Pradesh Agriculture Minister urges farmers to stay alert as cyclone threat looms
content: With a deep depression set to intensify into a severe cyclone within 48 hours, Atchannaidu calls for heightened preparedness, directing officials to guide farmers, protect crops and livestock, and coordinate response efforts across vulnerable regions

title: Webinar on medtech to be held on November 28
content: The session aims to equip students, aspiring engineers, and young professionals with insights into emerging technologies, evolving career opportunities, and the increasing global demand within the sector

title: IAS officer Mahantesh Bilagi, two relatives die in road accident near Kalaburagi
content: They were all travelling from Ramdurg in Belagavi district to Kalaburagi to attend a family wedding when the accident occurred

title: 10-Day Tirupati Vaikuntha Darshan Announced; All You Need To Know
content: The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams (TTD) has announced elaborate arrangements and detailed guidelines for the upcoming Vaikuntha Dwara Darshan at the Srivari Temple, scheduled to run for ten days from December 30 to January 8.

title: Explainer: How Will Next UN Chief Be Chosen And Who Wants The Job?
content: A new United Nations secretary-general will be elected next year for a five-year term starting on January 1, 2027.

title: UN Begins Process To Elect Next Secretary-General
content: The search for the next Secretary-General of the United Nations launched Tuesday, as member states were invited to send nominations to replace Antonio Guterres for the term starting in 2027.

title: Jair Bolsonaro Behind Bars: The Fall Of Brazil's Polarising Firebrand
content: Bolsonaro, a former army captain, once electrified supporters with his gloves-off style, while drawing criticism for comments slamming gays, demeaning women and praising Brazil's dictatorship years.

title: 14 Lakh SIR Forms Identified As 'Uncollectable' So Far In Bengal: Poll Body
content: Nearly 14 lakh SIR enumeration forms have so far been identified as "uncollectable" in West Bengal, the Election Commission said on Tuesday.

title: Poll Body To Meet Trinamool Delegation On Friday Amid SIR Protests
content: The Election Commission of India (EC) has scheduled a meeting with a ten-member delegation of the ruling All India Trinamool Congress (AITMC) on November 28.

title: Zelensky Welcomes "Principles" Of New US Draft To End War
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Tuesday the "principles" of a revised US plan to end the war with Russia could lead to "deeper agreements" and that "much depends" on Washington.

title: Trump Says Envoy Witkoff Will Meet Putin In Moscow To Discuss Peace Plan
content: US President Donald Trump said Tuesday he was sending envoy Steve Witkoff to meet with Russia's Vladimir Putin in Moscow to iron out "a few" remaining differences over a deal to end the Ukraine war.

title: US To Slap Big Surcharge On Foreign Visitors To National Parks
content: Foreign tourists visiting US national parks including the Grand Canyon and Yellowstone will now pay a hefty surcharge, the Trump administration announced Tuesday.

title: Rabri Devi Asked To Vacate 10 Circular Road Patna Residence After 2 Decades
content: The Bihar Building Construction Department on Tuesday allotted House No. 39 on Harding Road in Patna to former Bihar Chief Minister Rabri Devi for her use as Leader of Opposition in the Bihar Legislative Council.

title: Who Is Kirill Dmitriev, Russian Envoy Who Helped Craft New Ukraine Peace Plan
content: Kirill Dmitriev is not a professional diplomat. But the head of Russia's sovereign wealth has emerged as a key player in drafting a new proposal to end Moscow's war in Ukraine.

title: Pakistan Denies Strike On Afghanistan After Taliban Vows Retaliation
content: Afghanistan's Taliban government vowed on Tuesday to "respond appropriately" to deadly overnight air strikes it blamed on Pakistan, a claim Islamabad denied, as tensions spiked a day after a suicide bombing in a Pakistani city.

title: Zelesnky Says Ukraine Ready To Move Ahead With Trump's Peace Plan
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Tuesday that Kyiv was ready to move forward with a US-backed peace deal and that he was prepared to discuss its sensitive points with US President Donald Trump in talks he said should include European allies.

title: Trump Says 'Very Close' To Ukraine Peace Deal, But Europe Remains Cautious
content: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday said a Ukraine-Russia deal is "very close," but European leaders were skeptical and Russian missiles continued to rain down on Kyiv.

title: Assam Tables Bill To Ban Polygamy, Proposes Jail For Offenders
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma on Tuesday tabled a bill in the Assembly to ban polygamy, making it an offence with up to seven years of imprisonment for first offence.

title: Ex-Brazilian President Bolsonaro Exhausts Appeals, To Serve 27-Year Sentence
content: Brazil's Supreme Court on Tuesday ruled that former president Jair Bolsonaro's coup conviction was final, with no more appeals allowed, clearing the way for him to begin serving a 27-year sentence.

title: "DK Shivakumar Will Be Chief Minister Soon": Congress MLA Who Is '200% Sure'
content: Some Karnataka Congress legislators who travelled to New Delhi to meet party leaders to pitch for deputy Chief Minister D K Shivakumar's elevation as Chief Minister, said here on Tuesday that the leadership will decide on the matter.

title: Judges Fair, Fearless, Only Follow Constitution: Ex-Chief Justice To NDTV
content: Justice BR Gavai, the former Chief Justice of India, has told NDTV that while the Indian judiciary is independent, their actions are often seen through the prism of politics.

title: Wear Jeans, Not Pajamas: US Transport Secretary Calls For 'Air Civility'
content: US Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy has urged travellers to dress formally, as it would make people behave better at airports.

title: Floods Swamp Homeless Palestinians' Tents In Gaza As Winter Looms
content: Heavy rain caused flooding in the Gaza Strip on Tuesday, swamping the tents of thousands of homeless Palestinians facing the prospect of harsh winter storms without sturdy shelter.

title: Bank fraud case: Sandesara bros may end up paying more than they owe
content: government has already recovered Rs 4,700 crore from the Sandesaras' Sterling Biotech Ltd (SBL) since 2018 . they attached more than Rs 14,500 crore worth of their assets in india and abroad . the total recoveries would now be over Rs 9,800 crore, sources said .

title: Mitchell, Cunningham move up in latest NBA 2K26 ratings
content: 2K Games has announced its next round of changes to ratings for NBA 2K26 to reflect players' real-life ability on the court . Cade Cunningham from the Detroit Pistons is another player moving up by one point, to a 93 OVR . he scored 46 points with 12 rebounds, 11 assists, five steals and two blocks .

title: 'Can't monitor, entertain every hate speech case in country': SC
content: a bench of justices said it is not possible for the apex court to entertain every such incident . the bench said it was for police to take action as per law . it said the state authorities were not taking action and the order was being violated .

title: 'One district in India got 220k H-1Bs': US economist alleges visa 'fraud'
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: Online money games used to fund terror, govt tells SC
content: promotion and regulation of online gaming act bans online money games . centre says it is premature to examine validity of the law . the law was meant to protect individuals from adverse social, economic, psychological and privacy impacts . it is also meant to safeguard the integrity of financial systems and security .

title: Ram Temple ceremony: PM focuses on civilisational pride, takes dig at historians
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi speaks during the Dhwajarohan Utsav at Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Mandir, in Ayodhya (ANI photo) When he's not chasing stories, you‚Äôll likely find him exploring food lanes, indulging in mutton delicacies and sundaes. He is a journalist with a can-do spirit and a flair for compelling storytelling.  From railways and aviation to defence, infrastructure, social development and various other diverse beats, his reportage reflects depth.  His work has earned him the Times Scribe Award four times. Read More

title: Lost share certificates? Sebi to make it easy to get copies
content: Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: Transfer portal primer: 'At 12:01 a.m. on Jan. 2, you're going to see people instantly commit'
content: the transfer portal officially opens on Jan. 2, the day after the college football playoff quarterfinals . the spring portal window in April means programs have one shot to get this right if they want to win big in 2026 . this season has brought more proof of concept that a portal-heavy approach can dramatically flip a program's fortunes, with Indiana and Texas Tech in the national championship hunt .

title: MLB offseason grades: Boston bolsters rotation with swap for Sonny Gray
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here . we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . a big-money free agent signing changes the course of your team's future or a blockbuster trade .

title: Free agent pickups: The players you need for a playoff push
content: the 12th Sunday of the season featured a historic outing by a Detroit Lions RB Jahmyr Gibbs and a notable comeback victories by the desperate Kansas City Chiefs and Dallas Cowboys . four teams served their bye this week, but none do this coming Thanksgiving week, which features a trio of games on Thursday .

title: Who's making the grade, and who's failing at the NHL quarter mark? Grades for all 32 teams
content: the 2025-26 season has reached its quarter mark, with all 32 teams having played more than 20 games . a first-quarter letter grade for all 32 clubs is through the games of Nov. 23 . they lead the NHL in goals per game while also giving up the fewest goals .

title: Arman Tsarukyan reasserts his place near top at lightweight
content: arman Tsarukyan is one of the best lightweights in the world on saturday . he choked out Dan Hooker in a one-sided main event of UFC Fight Night in doha, Qatar . the only other movement in these rankings is at welterweight .

title: The wolves of Real Madrid are already snarling at Xabi Alonso's door
content: Xabi Alonso has defended his side following their 2-2 draw against Elche . the real madrid boss is in the top eight positions of the UEFA champions league . but he'll know he is. wolves are at the door and someone at his club is encouraging them to snarl .

title: ‚ÄòSign of structural issues‚Äô: CJI Surya Kant addresses case backlog in courts
content: 5.4 crore cases are pending in trial courts, 63.8 lakh in high courts and 90,000 in SC . chief justice Surya Kant takes oath as the new CJI . he says the growing backlog of cases is a manifestation of deeper structural bottlenecks .

title: Treat cricket betting profits as 'proceeds of crime': HC
content: money laundering will be treated as "proceeds of crime" under the money laundering law . the money is linked to a criminal activity defined as a scheduled offence under PMLA . ED attached movable and immovable properties valued at Rs 20 crore belonging to the accused .

title: Bring back 6 Bangladesh deportees, probe citizenship: SC
content: the deportees were deported to Bangladesh on grounds of being illegal immigrants . the court suggested that it bring back the pregnant Sunali Khatun and five others . a bench of the CJI and the court called for tough measures against infiltrators .

title: Arunachal integral part of India, govt tells China
content: no amount of denial by the Chinese side is going to change this indisputable reality, says the ministry of extrenal affairs . china reiterates its claim over the northeast Indian state following controversy over the detention of an inalienable woman at Shanghai airport . the move violated its own regulations that allow visa-free transit up to 24 hours for nationals of all countries .

title: Bills add help at receiver, sign veteran Cooks
content: the bills have elevated receiver Gabe Davis from the practice squad for the past two games . second-year receiver Keon Coleman has been a healthy scratch for the last two games stemming initially from disciplinary issues . quarterback dalton Kincaid has the most receiving touchdowns on the team wi-fi .

title: CFP Bubble Watch after Tuesday's ranking: Who needs a win during Rivalry Week?
content: the ACC's hope of having two teams qualify for the 12-team field is still alive . a gap remains in spite of the head-to-head win over Notre Dame . the canes have no margins, but are still ranked above no. 24 Tulane .

title: In a 1st, EV registrations across segments cross 2 million in 2025

title: Maoist military brass calls for fight to finish, day after seeking truce
content: a new statement marks the 25th anniversary of PLGA . it was a show of defiance against what maoists described as a "brink war" the govt has repeatedly asserted that the insurgency will be crushed by March 2026 .
